mapper.delete: DELETE FROM mlsql_group_role WHERE name=#{name} AND mlsql_group_id=#{groupId}

SELECT group_concat(concat(roles.name)) AS roles FROM mlsql_user users JOIN mlsql_role_member members ON users.id=members.mlsql_user_id JOIN mlsql_group_role roles ON roles.id=members.mlsql_group_role_id WHERE users.name=#{userName} GROUP BY users.name
SELECT group_concat(concat(roleNames)) AS roleNames FROM ( SELECT name as roleNames FROM mlsql_group_role GROUP BY name )roles
